content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of having opinions or beliefs. However, it is well-known that players are more motivated when playing in front of a supportive home crowd. The lack of crowd support due to Covid-19 restrictions may affect players' mental and emotional state which can impact their performance on the field. Without the excitement and energy of supporters cheering them on, players may struggle to find the same level of motivation as they would with a home crowd. Nonetheless, professional athletes maintain a strict discipline and routine, and players must learn to adapt to new challenges, and therefore many of them are finding ways to remain motivated even in the absence of fans.
